name: Action Box
description: Call-to-action container with bulleted recommendations and next steps, placed near the end of the document before any appendix. Uses g10 theme and HighlightBox tone for visual emphasis.

grid.margins: $spacing-07 (32px) internal padding, $spacing-09 (48px) top margin for separation

components: HighlightBox(success) or HighlightBox(info) as visual wrapper
Optional CTA: $heading-03 bold closing statement or contact prompt
rules: Maximum 5 recommendations — more than 5 dilutes urgency; aim for 3 as the strong default
Use HighlightBox with tone 'success' for positive recommendations or 'info' for neutral next steps
Always use g10 theme background to visually distinguish from preceding analysis content
Section heading uses $heading-04 — not larger, to maintain hierarchy below chapter titles
Each recommendation starts with a priority/timeframe prefix in $label-01 bold
Recommendations use $body-long-01 for readability — each should be 1-2 sentences max
Place near document end: after conclusion/analysis sections, before appendix if one exists
Internal padding is $spacing-07 (32px) on all sides within the HighlightBox wrapper
antiPatterns: Never exceed 5 recommendations — a long list of actions causes decision paralysis
Never place the action box at the beginning of the document — it must follow the analysis that justifies it
Never use full-width (colSpan 16) — the offset creates focus and prevents the box from feeling like a wall of text
Never omit the HighlightBox wrapper — a plain list of recommendations lacks visual distinction from body content
Never use HighlightBox tone 'danger' for recommendations — danger tone implies problems, not solutions
